Clubhouse Contact Information
Main Phone:
270-842-0325
Our Main Phone will be staffed by our Office Assistant primarily from 8:30 AM to 2:30 PM, Tuesday through Friday. If you’re looking to make reservations, pay your bill, sign-up for an event, pickup a To-Go order, or just aren’t sure who to call, contact our Main Phone and we’ll be happy to assist you!

Play
Membership
Introductory Junior (Age 21-29)
Our Introductory Junior Membership is our full golf membership for members aged 21 to 29. Introductory Junior Members enjoy access to all amenities.
Junior (Age 30-39)
Our Junior Membership is our full golf membership for members aged 30 to 39. Junior Members enjoy access to all amenities.
Full (Age 40-64)
Our Full Membership is our full golf membership for members aged 40 to 64. Full Members enjoy access to all amenities.
Senior (Age 65+)
Our Senior Membership is our full golf membership for members aged 65 and older. Senior Members enjoy access to all amenities.
Corporate (Minimum 3 Memberships)
Our Corporate Membership is our full golf membership for a minimum of three Memberships. Corporate Members enjoy access to all amenities.
Civic (All Ages)
Our Civic Membership is our full golf membership for active military, Veterans, first responders (law enforcement, fire, paramedic) and teachers. Civic Members enjoy access to all amenities.
Social (All Ages)
Social Members enjoy access to Pool, Tennis, Dining, and Social events. Social may pay associated fees to play Golf.
General Information
Our memberships are family memberships and cover the primary member, spouse/partner, and dependent children up to age 26.  All memberships are an 18-month agreement.
